Posts.Content: Hello again, I see alot of posts about taxol. My wife went through 4 treatments of AC. She will now be starting 4 more treatments of Taxol and Gemzar. Has anyone out there used this combo and what were there side effects. The treatments will be every two weeks.
Posts.Title: Taxol and Gemzar

Posts.Content: Hi all I have a question that I hope someone can help me out with. My wife had surgery 3 month ago. A lumpectomy and level 3 lymph node removal. 12 of 12 nodes were positive. She is a stage IIIC and the margins are not clear. She is presenty going through chemo and will still need a mastectomy followed by radiation. She is doing quite well so far except for one problem. Since her surgery she has been unable to void on her own. She has to catherize herself every 3 hours. We have been to a urologist where they ran some test and couldn't find anything wrong. They told us it could take up to six months before bladder returns to normal. We think someone screwed up during surgery and they aren't telling us the truth since the urologist is at the same hospital that the surgery was. Has anyone else out there had this problem and if they did how long before bladder returns to normal.
Posts.Title: Problems voiding after surgery

Posts.Content: She didn't have any problems voiding before the surgery. The doctor is trying to tell that the bladder was probally weak before the surgery and it got over stretched and will take a long time to return to normal.
Posts.Title: Problems voiding after surgery
